name: Escape Takashi
description:
Made in (almost) four days for the "A Game By Its Cover 2016" game jam. The idea is simple - avoid bumping into stuff, fight back and survive while causing ultimate chaos.

Ultimately, you need to survive for a minute and a half while numerous waves of cops arrive.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- SPACE to throw barrel behind you

Made with Unreal Engine 4.

Music track: "Club Diver" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Inspired by the following cartridge art: http://famicase.com/16/softs/21.html
